nodes.text: This video hit my heart.\nIt hurts me a lot that during a pandemic, an overdose crisis, rising anti-Asian violence, police murders of Black & Indigenous ppl, increasing right wing extremism, politicians still act like translation & interpretation is not important. It is ESSENTIAL. https://t.co/D1aN9wmiLo
@kulpreetsingh Thats exactly what I thought too.  Wheres her advocate for her behalf.  Treat elders with respect. Cops need sensitivity training theyre so by the book.
